name: Palm Strikes
description: Develop powerful and precise palm strikes used in Baguazhang for energy redirection and impact.

cards.title: Piercing Palm Strike
cards.description: A straight palm strike that focuses energy into a single point for penetration.
bulletpoints: Align the wrist with the forearm for structural integrity
Strike with the base of the palm for maximum force
Use a snapping motion to increase speed and impact

cards.title: Spiral Palm Strike
cards.description: A rotating palm strike designed to slip through an opponent's defenses.
bulletpoints: Rotate the wrist as you extend the strike
Maintain a relaxed yet firm hand position
Follow through with body movement for added power
